modName: UNP Bouncing Boobs - Using CHSBHC BBP
summary: Compilation of CHSBHC breast physics with Dimonized UNP Female Body.
descriptionHtml:
Dimonized UNP Bouncing Boobs - Using CHSBHC BBP
_______________________________________________

Full credit and \"Thank You\'s\" to both 

CherryHotaling for her - CHSBHC mod and BBP (Breast Bouncing Physics) and animations.(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888)

and

dimon99 for his Dimonized UNP Female Body. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709)

for their great work.

________________________________________________

In the world of Skyrim, there is only one plastic surgeon that can make breasts bounce and move as though they were soft, bouncing, boobs.  That surgeon is CherryHotaling. Her enhanced breasts come in 2 sizes... Gigantic, and Enormous.  For those of us who like smaller, more natural sized breasts are forced to use good mods such as Dimonized UNP
Female Bodies, but while good lack the natural bounce and movement of actual breasts.  

What this mod does:

This mod uses the skeleton, breast weights, and animations created by CherryHotaling, and applies them to dimon99\'s UNP female body.  The end result, a more petite \"girl next door\" type girl, with natural sized and naturally bouncing breasts.

________________________________________________

Installation Instructions

1) Download and install CherryHotalings mod first. You only need the skeletons, and animations. If you don\'t know how to pick and choose what to install, just install everything.

2) Download and install Dimonized UNP Female Body. Complete install, overwrite everything that was previously installed.

3) Download and install this mod last.  Overwrite UNP\'s files.

4) Don\'t forget the Recommended Downloads.  They help with a few issues.  And look better IMO

I manually install everything (ie: Place all files in file directory. C:\\Games\\Skyrim\\Data etc.) Overwrite where appropriate. If you use mod manager just make sure the load order remains the same 1,2,3 last.

_________________________________________________
RECOMMENDED Downloads

Download and install any other animations or mods you find that support CHSBCH BBP meshes. A couple I found and use are:

BBP Scale - by VadersApp (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7814)

NoMaaM Breathing Idles BBB - by fore (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7093)

___________________________

Optional Downloads include:

Bouncing variation of abb1\'s UNP- Topless Forsworn armor (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7332)
Install his mod first then this one.

Bouncing UNP variation of Glass Armor mod.  Compatable with transparent Glass Armor mods such as mine. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2212)
Install main mod, then overwrite with this one.


F.A.Q.\'s

Q) That seems easy enough how come it took you so long to put this together?
A) $*(@ *#@!!! This was a pain my ass.  And I can barely work with meshes so I move very slowly.

Q) Does this work with the underwear version?
A) No.  I would need to start over on the underwear version to do so, and I\'m not doing that, at least not yet.   I\'ve figured out the hard part, but I\'m not ready to do that yet.

Q) Can you...?
A) No, I can\'t.  I sat down and figured this out.  Your turn...

Q) My Neck/Hand seams don\'t line up seamlessly.  Did you know this?
A) These mods weren\'t exactly intended to be compiled like this.  This is as good as I can do, at least for the time being... deal with it, or fix it.   I don\'t work with meshes much, any help is appreciated.
author: AjuntaPall316
